item.description: Cheri Perry and Turner Wilson of Kayak Ways are offering kayak rolling instruction from 6:30- to 8:30 pm. While we specialize in Greenlandic Instruction, we can work with any blade. This session is small and we only take 4 folks. This session is ideal for all skill sets from beginning to advanced. We do a short demo and then work in a one to one format. We will try to provide a low volume kayak for new rollers and a tuiliq and greenland blade for those who need one.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the pool, you have to go thru the main entrance to get yourself to the pool, leave kayaks by gate
item.name: Rolling Instruction in North Conway NH
